abstract: What’s inside Mark Zuckerberg’s hoodie and how to sue lots of people top the reading list.
snippet: What’s inside Mark Zuckerberg’s hoodie and how to sue lots of people top the reading list.
lead_paragraph: Here’s a selection of what the tech editors and reporters have been reading this week.Zuckerberg’s Bizarre Facebook Insignia Revealed, And What It Means — blogs.sfweekly.comNick Bilton says: Mark Zuckeberg’s hoodie has a bizarre insignia inside; here’s what it looks like.Official Google Blog: Hello from the Hiveplex — googleblog.blogspot.comNick Bilton says: Googlers decide search isn’t enough. Now they’re making honey, too, installing Google beehives.
